Persian Consonant Vowel Combination (PCV.description: -Malek/PCVC) - The Persian Consonant Vowel Combination (PCVC) Speech Dataset is a Modern Persian speech corpus for speech recognition and also speaker recognition. This dataset contains 23 Persian consonants and 6 vowels. The sound samples are all possible combinations of vowels and consonants (138 samples for each speaker) with a length of 30000 data samples.
